name: Sutra Spiral
description: Young Tibetan monks recite the Wisdom Sutra at a monastry in Dagpo Shedrup Ling, Kais, Himachal Pradesh,India.The Tibetan Buddhist monks line up in order of age with the youngest monk in the middle. The text is supposed to have great purifying power. Photographer: Bas Uterwijk | medium: PNG, 5506 x 3671 pixels | original capture date: July 29, 2009
